title: What happens if humans start using 70% of their brain? - Quora

response.answer_text: If the humans start using the 70% brains then definitely there will be improve in technology which makes a big distance of relationship between the one to another and to the society. And increase in the manufacturing of robots will make the people to stop their works.So the people are born in different area with different thinking knowledge. And the humans live in illusion and in the hands of the upcoming trend that changes the livelihood of the people….
